blocks.name: ckq
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the Kolmogorov quotient function.
blocks.origin: const class ckq { KQ }

blocks.name: diff.ckq.s
diff.ckq.c
diff.ckq.w
df-kq
blocks.content: Define the Kolmogorov quotient. This is a function on topologies which maps a topology to its quotient under the topological distinguishability map, which takes a point to the set of open sets that contain it. Two points are mapped to the same image under this function iff they are topologically indistinguishable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.content: Value of the quotient topology function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)

thm qtopval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0))), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0)), universe))
  adantl(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0)), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0)), universe), wcel(cima(c2, c4), universe), wcel(cpw(cima(c2, c4)), universe))
  imaexg(c2, universe, c4)
  pwexg(cima(c2, c4), universe)
  rabexg(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), universe, wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0))
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0)), universe, cqtop, crab(s0, cpw(cima(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cuni(cv(hs0))), cv(hs0))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cpw(cima(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cuni(cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0))
  pweqd(cima(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), cima(c2, c4), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  imaeq12d(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)), c2, c4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eleq12d(cin(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cuni(cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  ineq12d(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cuni(cv(hs0)), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cv(s0), ccnv(c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  cnveqd(cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4, cuni(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  unieqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-qtop(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cima(c2, c4))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c4)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c4), c0)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cima(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))))
  diff.cima.s(s0, cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm qtopval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[qTop]c2)= { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 })
  ‚ä£ c4 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[qTop]c2)= { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 }), d(s0, c1))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c0[qTop]c2)= { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 }, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c0[qTop]c2)= { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 }, { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå, { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  3syl(c2 ‚àà ùïå, { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 } ‚àà ùïå, (c2 " c4)‚àà ùïå, P((c2 " c4))‚àà ùïå)
  imaexg(c2, universe, c4)
  pwexg((c2 " c4), universe)
  rabexg(s0, P((c2 " c4)), universe, ((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 }, universe, cqtop, { s0 ‚àà P((hs1 " ‚ãÉ hs0))|((`' hs1 " s0)‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà hs0 })
  rabeqbidv(s0, P((hs1 " ‚ãÉ hs0)), P((c2 " c4)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), ((`' hs1 " s0)‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà hs0, ((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0)
  pweqd((hs1 " ‚ãÉ hs0), (c2 " c4), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  imaeq12d(hs1, ‚ãÉ hs0, c2, c4, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  eleq12d(((`' hs1 " s0)‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ hs0), hs0, ((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4), c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  ineq12d((`' hs1 " s0), ‚ãÉ hs0, (`' c2 " s0), c4, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  imaeq1d(`' hs1, s0, `' c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  cnveqd(hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  syl6eqr(‚ãÉ hs0, c4, ‚ãÉ c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  unieqd(hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  df-qtop(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (c2 " c4))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 })
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c4))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c4)‚àà c0 })
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (hs1 " ‚ãÉ hs0))
  diff.cima.s(s0, hs1, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: qtopval2
blocks.content: Value of the quotient topology function when ` F ` is a function on the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)

thm qtopval2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(s0, cpw(c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c0))))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(s0, cpw(c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c0)), crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c5)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5), c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c5)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5), c0))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wcel(c2, universe), wf(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c3, universe))
  ssexd(c3, c5, universe, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, cuni(c0), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  fex(c2, c3, c4, universe)
  qtopval(s0, c0, c1, c2, universe, c5)
  rabeqbidv(s0, cpw(cima(c2, c5)), cpw(c4), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5), c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c0))
  pweqd(cima(c2, c5), c4, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  eqssd(cima(c2, c5), c4, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  syl5sseq(cima(c2, c5), c4, crn(c2), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  imassrn(c2, c5)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5), wceq(crn(c2), c4))
  forn(c2, c3, c4)
  eqsstr3d(c4, cima(c2, c5), cima(c2, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5), wceq(cima(c2, c3), c4))
  foima(c2, c3, c4)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wss(cima(c2, c3), cima(c2, c5)), wss(c3, c5))
  imass2(c3, c5, c2)
  eleq1d(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5), c0, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wceq(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0))), wss(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5))
  sstrd(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  fssdm(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c3, c2, c4, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  cnvimass(c2, cv(s0))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5), wf(c2, c3, c4))
  fof(c2, c3, c4)
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5))
  df-ss(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), c5)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cima(c2, c5))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, c5)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c4)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wfo.s(s0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c3, c5)
}

thm qtopval2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5)‚Üí(c0[qTop]c2)= { s0 ‚àà P(c4)|(`' c2 " s0)‚àà c0 })
  ‚ä£ c5 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[qTop]c2), { s0 ‚àà P(c4)|(`' c2 " s0)‚àà c0 }, { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c5))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c5)‚àà c0 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), (c0[qTop]c2)= { s0 ‚àà P((c2 " c5))|((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c5)‚àà c0 }, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c2 : c3 ‚Üí c4), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexd(c3, c5, universe, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, ‚ãÉ c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  fex(c2, c3, c4, universe)
  qtopval(s0, c0, c1, c2, universe, c5)
  rabeqbidv(s0, P((c2 " c5)), P(c4), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), ((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c5)‚àà c0, (`' c2 " s0)‚àà c0)
  pweqd((c2 " c5), c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  eqssd((c2 " c5), c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  syl5sseq((c2 " c5), c4, ran(c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  imassrn(c2, c5)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5, ran(c2)= c4)
  forn(c2, c3, c4)
  eqsstr3d(c4, (c2 " c5), (c2 " c3), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5, (c2 " c3)= c4)
  foima(c2, c3, c4)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), (c2 " c3)‚äÜ(c2 " c5), c3 ‚äÜ c5)
  imass2(c3, c5, c2)
  eleq1d(((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c5), c0, (`' c2 " s0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), ((`' c2 " s0)‚ãÇ c5)=(`' c2 " s0), (`' c2 " s0)‚äÜ c5)
  sstrd((`' c2 " s0), c5, c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  fssdm((`' c2 " s0), c3, c2, c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  cnvimass(c2, s0)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5, (c2 : c3 ‚Üí c4))
  fof(c2, c3, c4)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5)
  df-ss((`' c2 " s0), c5)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (c2 " c5))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, c5)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c4)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wfo.s(s0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c3, c5)
}

thm elqtop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wb(wcel(c6, co(c0, cqtop, c2)), wa(wss(c6, c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), c6), c0))))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(c0))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wcel(c6, co(c0, cqtop, c2)), wa(wss(c6, c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), c6), c0)), wcel(c6, crab(hs0, cpw(c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  eleq2d(c6, co(c0, cqtop, c2), crab(hs0, cpw(c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  qtopval2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wcel(c6, crab(hs0, cpw(c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c0))), wa(wss(c6, c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), c6), c0)), wa(wcel(c6, cpw(c4)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), c6), c0)))
  elrab(hs0, c6, cpw(c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), c6), c0))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c0, cima(ccnv(c2), c6), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), c6, ccnv(c2))
  anbi1d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wcel(c6, cpw(c4)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), c6), c0), wss(c6, c4))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wb(wcel(c6, cpw(c4)), wss(c6, c4)), wcel(c4, universe))
  sylc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wfo(c2, c3, c4))
  ssexd(c3, c5, universe, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5))
  fornex(c3, universe, c2, c4)
  elpw2g(c4, universe, c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c4))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), c6), c0))
}

thm elqtop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5)‚Üí(c6 ‚àà(c0[qTop]c2)‚Üî(c6 ‚äÜ c4 ‚àß(`' c2 " c6)‚àà c0)))
  ‚ä£ c5 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), c6 ‚àà(c0[qTop]c2), (c6 ‚äÜ c4 ‚àß(`' c2 " c6)‚àà c0), c6 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà P(c4)|(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0 })
  eleq2d(c6, (c0[qTop]c2), { hs0 ‚àà P(c4)|(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  qtopval2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), c6 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà P(c4)|(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0 }, (c6 ‚äÜ c4 ‚àß(`' c2 " c6)‚àà c0), (c6 ‚àà P(c4)‚àß(`' c2 " c6)‚àà c0))
  elrab(hs0, c6, P(c4), (`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0, (`' c2 " c6)‚àà c0)
  eleq1d((`' c2 " hs0), c0, (`' c2 " c6), hs0 = c6)
  imaeq2(hs0, c6, `' c2)
  anbi1d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), c6 ‚àà P(c4), (`' c2 " c6)‚àà c0, c6 ‚äÜ c4)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), (c6 ‚àà P(c4)‚Üî c6 ‚äÜ c4), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  sylc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5), c4 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4))
  ssexd(c3, c5, universe, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c5))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5, c5 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), c3 ‚äÜ c5)
  fornex(c3, universe, c2, c4)
  elpw2g(c4, universe, c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c4))
  diff.hs0.w((`' c2 " c6)‚àà c0)

blocks.name: qtopres
blocks.content: The quotient topology is unaffected by restriction to the base set. This property makes it slightly more convenient to use, since we don't have to require that ` F ` be a function with domain ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qtopres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cqtop, c0), co(c2, cqtop, cres(c0, c3))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c2))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cqtop, c0), co(c2, cqtop, cres(c0, c3))), wcel(c2, universe))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c2, cqtop, c0), co(c2, cqtop, cres(c0, c3))))
  3eqtr4a(co(c2, cqtop, c0), co(c2, cqtop, cres(c0, c3)), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(c0, c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c3), c2)), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(cres(c0, c3), c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), c2)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  eqtr2i(crab(hs0, cpw(cima(c0, c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c3), c2)), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(cres(c0, c3), c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), c2)), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(c0, c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), c2)))
  rabeqi(hs0, cpw(cima(cres(c0, c3), c3)), cpw(cima(c0, c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), c2))
  pweqi(cima(cres(c0, c3), c3), cima(c0, c3))
  resima(c0, c3)
  rabbii(hs0, cpw(cima(c0, c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), c2), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c3), c2))
  eleq1i(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), c2, cin(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c3))
  3eqtr3i(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c3), cima(ccnv(cres(cres(c0, c3), c3)), cv(hs0)), cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(cres(cres(c0, c3), c3)), cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c0, c3)))
  cnveqi(cres(cres(c0, c3), c3), cres(c0, c3))
  residm(c0, c3)
  cnvresima(cres(c0, c3), c3, cv(hs0))
  cnvresima(c0, c3, cv(hs0))
  qtopval(hs0, c2, universe, c0, c1, c3)
  sylan2(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cqtop, cres(c0, c3)), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(cres(c0, c3), c3)), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cres(c0, c3)), cv(hs0)), c3), c2))), wcel(cres(c0, c3), universe))
  resexg(c0, c1, c3)
  qtopval(hs0, c2, universe, cres(c0, c3), universe, c3)
  eqtr4d(co(c2, cqtop, c0), co(c2, cqtop, cres(c0, c3)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  ovprc1(c2, cqtop, c0)
  ovprc1(c2, cqtop, cres(c0, c3))
  reldmmpt2(hs1, hs2, cqtop, universe, universe, crab(hs0, cpw(cima(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), cv(hs1))))
  df-qtop(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cima(cres(c0, c3), c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cima(c0, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, c3))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2[qTop]c0)=(c2[qTop](c0 |` c3)))
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c2
} = {
  pm2.61d1(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[qTop]c0)=(c2[qTop](c0 |` c3)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)

  eqtr2i({ hs0 ‚àà P((c0 " c3))|((`' c0 " hs0)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2 }, { hs0 ‚àà P(((c0 |` c3)" c3))|((`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2 }, { hs0 ‚àà P((c0 " c3))|((`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2 })
  rabeqi(hs0, P(((c0 |` c3)" c3)), P((c0 " c3)), ((`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2)
  pweqi(((c0 |` c3)" c3), (c0 " c3))
  resima(c0, c3)
  rabbii(hs0, P((c0 " c3)), ((`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2, ((`' c0 " hs0)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2)
  eleq1i(((`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)‚ãÇ c3), c2, ((`' c0 " hs0)‚ãÇ c3))

  imaeq1i(`'((c0 |` c3)|` c3), hs0, `'(c0 |` c3))
  cnveqi(((c0 |` c3)|` c3), (c0 |` c3))
  residm(c0, c3)
  cnvresima((c0 |` c3), c3, hs0)
  cnvresima(c0, c3, hs0)
  qtopval(hs0, c2, universe, c0, c1, c3)
  sylan2(c2 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[qTop](c0 |` c3))= { hs0 ‚àà P(((c0 |` c3)" c3))|((`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2 }, (c0 |` c3)‚àà ùïå)
  resexg(c0, c1, c3)
  qtopval(hs0, c2, universe, (c0 |` c3), universe, c3)
  eqtr4d((c2[qTop]c0), (c2[qTop](c0 |` c3)), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovprc1(c2, cqtop, c0)
  ovprc1(c2, cqtop, (c0 |` c3))
  reldmmpt2(hs1, hs2, cqtop, universe, universe, { hs0 ‚àà P((hs2 " ‚ãÉ hs1))|((`' hs2 " hs0)‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ hs1)‚àà hs1 })
  df-qtop(hs1, hs2, hs0)

thm qtoptop2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wfun(c1)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop))

  eqeltrd(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop, co(c0, cqtop, cres(c1, cuni(c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wfun(c1)))

  ssrdv(hs1, co(c0, cqtop, cres(c1, cuni(c0))), cpw(crn(cres(c1, cuni(c0)))), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wfun(c1)))

  simprbda(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wfun(c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cqtop, cres(c1, cuni(c0)))), wss(cv(hs1), crn(cres(c1, cuni(c0)))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(c1, cuni(c0))), cv(hs1)), c0))

blocks.name: qtoptop
blocks.content: The quotient topology is a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qtoptop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, universe), wfun(c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(c1, c2))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(c1, c2), wcel(c1, universe), wfn(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  id(wfn(c1, c2))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  fnex(c1, c2, c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(c1, c2), wfun(c1))
  fnfun(c1, c2)
  qtoptop2(c0, c1, universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qtoptop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1[Fn]c2)‚Üí(c0[qTop]c1)‚àà Top)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1[Fn]c2), (c0[qTop]c1)‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà ùïå, Fun(c1))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Top, c1[Fn]c2)
  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà Top, c1[Fn]c2, c1 ‚àà ùïå, c1[Fn]c2, c2 ‚àà c0)
  id(c1[Fn]c2)
  topopn(c0, c2)
  fnex(c1, c2, c0)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Top, c1[Fn]c2, Fun(c1))
  fnfun(c1, c2)
  qtoptop2(c0, c1, universe)
}

  fof(c1, c2, c3)
  fimacnv(c1, c2, c3)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wfo(c1, c2, c3), wcel(c2, c0))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  elqtop2(c0, ctop, c1, c2, c3, c3)
  elssuni(c3, co(c0, cqtop, c1))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wfo(c1, c2, c3)), wss(cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), c3), wss(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cpw(c3)))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, cqtop, c1), cpw(c3), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wfo(c1, c2, c3)))

  simpl(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), c0))

}

  elqtop2(c0, ctop, c1, c2, c3, hs0)

  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfn(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wa(wf(c2, c1, crn(c2)), wral(hs0, co(c0, cqtop, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c0)))), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c2), cfv(ctopon, crn(c2))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfn(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c2), cfv(ctopon, crn(c2))), wfo(c2, c1, crn(c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfn(c2, c1)), wfo(c2, c1, crn(c2)), wfn(c2, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfn(c2, c1))
  dffn4(c2, c1)
  qtoptopon(c0, c1, c2, crn(c2))
  iscn(hs0, c0, c1, co(c0, cqtop, c2), crn(c2), c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfn(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cqtop, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qtopid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2[Fn]c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)))
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2[Fn]c1), c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)), (c2 : c1 ‚Üí ran(c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c0[qTop]c2),(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2[Fn]c1), (c2 : c1 ‚Üí ran(c2)), (c2 : c1 ‚Ü† ran(c2)))
  fof(c2, c1, ran(c2))
  ralrimiva(hs0, (c0[qTop]c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2[Fn]c1), (`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0)
  simplbda((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2[Fn]c1), hs0 ‚àà(c0[qTop]c2), (`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ ran(c2))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2[Fn]c1, (hs0 ‚àà(c0[qTop]c2)‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ ran(c2)‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0)), (c2 : c1 ‚Ü† ran(c2)))
  elqtop3(c0, c1, c2, ran(c2), hs0)
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2[Fn]c1, (c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2))‚Üî((c2 : c1 ‚Üí ran(c2))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c0[qTop]c2),(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c0))), (c0[qTop]c2)‚àà(TopOn ` ran(c2)))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2[Fn]c1, (c0[qTop]c2)‚àà(TopOn ` ran(c2)), (c2 : c1 ‚Ü† ran(c2)))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2[Fn]c1), (c2 : c1 ‚Ü† ran(c2)), c2[Fn]c1)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2[Fn]c1)
  dffn4(c2, c1)
  qtoptopon(c0, c1, c2, ran(c2))
  iscn(hs0, c0, c1, (c0[qTop]c2), ran(c2), c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2[Fn]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[qTop]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(ran(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: idqtop
blocks.content: The quotient topology induced by the identity function is the original topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm idqtop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cqtop, cres(cid, c1)), c0))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, cqtop, cres(cid, c1)), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  3bitr4d(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cqtop, cres(cid, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  syl5eq(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cima(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1))
  cnvresid(c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cima(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  resiima(cv(hs0), c1)
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cqtop, cres(cid, c1))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0))), wfo(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfo(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1ofo(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1)
  elqtop3(c0, c1, cres(cid, c1), c1, cv(hs0))
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  toponss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cqtop, cres(cid, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm idqtop(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí(c0[qTop](= |` c1))= c0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[qTop](= |` c1)), c0, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  3bitr4d(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚àà(c0[qTop](= |` c1)), hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)‚àà c0), (hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0))
  pm5.32da(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚äÜ c1, (`'(= |` c1)" hs0)‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  eleq1d((`'(= |` c1)" hs0), c0, hs0, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1))
  syl5eq((`'(= |` c1)" hs0), hs0, ((= |` c1)" hs0), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1))
  imaeq1i(`'(= |` c1), hs0, (= |` c1))
  cnvresid(c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚äÜ c1, ((= |` c1)" hs0)= hs0)
  resiima(hs0, c1)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[qTop](= |` c1))‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)‚àà c0)), ((= |` c1): c1 ‚Ü† c1))
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), ((= |` c1): c1 ‚Ü† c1), ((= |` c1): c1 ‚Üî c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1ofo((= |` c1), c1, c1)
  elqtop3(c0, c1, (= |` c1), c1, hs0)
  pm4.71rd(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ex(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  toponss(c0, c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[qTop](= |` c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
}

blocks.name: qtopcmplem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ qtopcmp and ~ qtopconn . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qtopcmplem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c2), c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ctop))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c2)))), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c2), c1))
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c2), c1), wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c2))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wfo(c2, c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wfo(c2, c3, crn(c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wfo(c2, c3, crn(c2)), wfn(c2, c3))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wb(wfo(c2, c3, crn(c2)), wfo(c2, c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2)))), wceq(crn(c2), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2))))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wceq(crn(c2), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wfo(c2, c3, crn(c2)))
  dffn4(c2, c3)
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, crn(c2)), wceq(crn(c2), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  qtopuni(c0, c2, c3, crn(c2))
  foeq3(crn(c2), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c2)), c2, c3)
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  toptopon(c0, c3)
  qtopid(c0, c3, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qtopcmplem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c3)‚Üí(c0[qTop]c2)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Top)
  ‚ä£ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2))‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)))‚Üí(c0[qTop]c2)‚àà c1)
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c3), (c0[qTop]c2)‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2)), c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2[Fn]c3)
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c3), (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2)), (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ran(c2)))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c3), (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ran(c2)), c2[Fn]c3)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2[Fn]c3)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c3), ((c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ran(c2))‚Üî(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2))), ran(c2)= ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2))
  sylan2b(c0 ‚àà c1, c2[Fn]c3, ran(c2)= ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2), (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ran(c2)))
  dffn4(c2, c3)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† ran(c2)), ran(c2)= ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2), c0 ‚àà Top)
  qtopuni(c0, c2, c3, ran(c2))
  foeq3(ran(c2), ‚ãÉ(c0[qTop]c2), c2, c3)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà c1, c2[Fn]c3, c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c0 ‚àà Top)
  toptopon(c0, c3)
  qtopid(c0, c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: qtopcmp
blocks.content: A quotient of a compact space is compact. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: qtopconn
blocks.content: A quotient of a connected space is connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: qtopkgen
blocks.content: A quotient of a compactly generated space is compactly generated. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qtopkgen(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), crn(ckgen)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), crn(ckgen)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop), wss(cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)), co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)), co(c0, cqtop, c1), wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cqtop, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  sseqtr4d(cv(hs0), crn(c1), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  sseqtr4d(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), cuni(cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  elssuni(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wceq(cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), cuni(cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop))
  kgenuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  eqid(cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wceq(crn(c1), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(c0, ctop), wfo(c1, c2, crn(c1)))
  qtopuni(c0, c1, c2, crn(c1))
  sylancom(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(c1, co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  eleqtrd(c1, co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(c1, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wfn(c1, c2))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)))
  toptopon(c0, c2)
  qtopid(c0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wceq(co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c1)), co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop))
  sylan(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop), wcel(c0, ctop))
  kgentop(c0)
  qtoptop(c0, c1, c2)
  kgencn3(c0, co(c0, cqtop, c1))
  cnima(c1, c0, cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)), cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cqtop, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfo(c1, c2, crn(c1)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wfo(c1, c2, crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1))))
  dffn4(c1, c2)
  elqtop2(c0, crn(ckgen), c1, c2, crn(c1), cv(hs0))
  iskgen2(co(c0, cqtop, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ckgen, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cqtop, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wfn(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qtopkgen(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ran(kGen)‚àß c1[Fn]c2)‚Üí(c0[qTop]c1)‚àà ran(kGen))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà ran(kGen)‚àß c1[Fn]c2), (c0[qTop]c1)‚àà ran(kGen), (c0[qTop]c1)‚àà Top, (kGen `(c0[qTop]c1))‚äÜ(c0[qTop]c1))
  ssrdv(hs0, (kGen `(c0[qTop]c1)), (c0[qTop]c1), (c0 ‚àà ran(kGen)‚àß c1[Fn]c2))
  ex((c0 ‚àà ran(kGen)‚àß c1[Fn]c2), hs0 ‚àà(kGen `(c0[qTop]c1)), hs0 ‚àà(c0[qTop]c1))

blocks.name: tgqtop
blocks.content: An injection maps generated topologies to each other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: qtopss
blocks.content: A surjective continuous function from ` J ` to ` K ` induces a topology ` J qTop F ` on the base set of ` K ` . This topology is in general finer than ` K ` . Together with ~ qtopid , this implies that ` J qTop F ` is the finest topology making ` F ` continuous, i.e. the final topology with respect to the family ` { F } ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, c2, co(c1, cqtop, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(crn(c0), c3)))

  toponss(c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  3ad2antl1(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(crn(c0), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1))
  cnima(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(crn(c0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqtop, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wfo(c0, cuni(c1), c3))

  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(crn(c0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wf(c0, cuni(c1), c3), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))

blocks.name: qtopeu
blocks.content: Universal property of the quotient topology. If ` G ` is a function from ` J ` to ` K ` which is equal on all equivalent elements under ` F ` , then there is a unique continuous map ` f : ( J / F ) --> K ` such that ` G = f o. F ` , and we say that ` G ` "passes to the quotient". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: qtoprest
blocks.content: If ` A ` is a saturated open or closed set (where saturated means that ` A = ( ``' F " U ) ` for some ` U ` ), then the restriction of the quotient map ` F ` to ` A ` is a quotient map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: qtopomap
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a surjective continuous open map, then it is a quotient map. (An open map is a function that maps open sets to open sets.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qtopomap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c2), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cima(c2, cv(s0)), c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  eqssd(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wss(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2)), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(crn(c2), c3))
  qtopss(c2, c1, c0, c3)
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c1, cqtop, c2), c0, w0)
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqtop, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqtop, c2)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3))
  elqtop3(c1, cuni(c1), c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  ex(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeltrrd(cv(hs0), c0, cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  adantrr(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)))
  sylan(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)), wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3), wfn(c2, cuni(c1)), wceq(crn(c2), c3))
  ffnd(c2, cuni(c1), c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wf(c2, cuni(c1), c3), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c0)))

  eleq1d(cima(c2, cv(s0)), c0, cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))))
  imaeq2(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c2)
  adantr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cima(c2, cv(s0)), c0)))

  sylanbrc(w0, (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† c3), c2[Fn]‚ãÉ c1, ran(c2)= c3)

  syl3anc(w0, (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí c3), c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c1), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c2 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  sylib(w0, c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c1), c1 ‚àà Top)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà Top, c2 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  cntop1(c2, c1, c0)
  toptopon2(c1)
  cnf2(c1, ‚ãÉ c1, c0, c3, c2)
  df-fo(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3)
  foimacnv(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3, hs0)
  rspcdva(s0, (`' c2 " hs0), c1, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (c2 "(`' c2 " hs0))‚àà c0, (c2 " s0)‚àà c0)
  eleq1d((c2 " s0), c0, (c2 "(`' c2 " hs0)), s0 =(`' c2 " hs0))
  imaeq2(s0, (`' c2 " hs0), c2)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c2 " s0)‚àà c0))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, (c2 " s0)‚àà c0)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ‚äÜ c3, (`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[qTop]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c2 "(`' c2 " hs0)), c0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, (`' c2 " hs0))
  diff.cima.s(s0, `' c2, hs0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

}

blocks.name: qtopcmap
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a surjective continuous closed map, then it is a quotient map. (A closed map is a function that maps closed sets to closed sets.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qtopcmap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c2), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccld, c1))), wcel(cima(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqssd(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wss(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2)), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(crn(c2), c3))
  qtopss(c2, c1, c0, c3)
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c1, cqtop, c2), c0, w0)
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqtop, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqtop, c2)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(c1, ctop), wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3))
  elqtop2(c1, ctop, c2, cuni(c1), c3, cv(hs0))
  ex(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  eqeltrrd(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0), cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  eqtrd(cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))), cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wceq(cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))), cdif(c3, cv(hs0))), wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3), wss(cdif(c3, cv(hs0)), c3))
  difss(c3, cv(hs0))
  foimacnv(c2, cuni(c1), c3, cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))
  difeq1d(c3, cv(hs0), cuni(c0), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  rspcdva(s0, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccld, c1), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cima(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  eleq1d(cima(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0), cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))))
  imaeq2(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0))), c2)
  adantr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccld, c1), wcel(cima(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, cfv(ccld, c1), w0, wcel(cima(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  eqeltrd(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccld, c1), cdif(cuni(c1), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  eqtrd(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0))), cdif(cuni(c1), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), cdif(cima(ccnv(c2), c3), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  4syl(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wceq(cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0))), cdif(cima(ccnv(c2), c3), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)))), wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3), wfun(c2), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c2))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, wfo(c2, cuni(c1), c3), wfn(c2, cuni(c1)), wceq(crn(c2), c3))
  ffnd(c2, cuni(c1), c3, w0)
  df-fo(c2, cuni(c1), c3)
  fofun(c2, cuni(c1), c3)
  funcnvcnv(c2)
  imadif(ccnv(c2), c3, cv(hs0))
  difeq1d(cima(ccnv(c2), c3), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1), wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wceq(cima(ccnv(c2), c3), cuni(c1)), wf(c2, cuni(c1), c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wf(c2, cuni(c1), c3))
  syl3anc(w0, wf(c2, cuni(c1), c3), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, ctop))
  toptopon2(c1)
  cnf2(c1, cuni(c1), c0, c3, c2)
  fimacnv(c2, cuni(c1), c3)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cdif(cuni(c1), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))
  adantr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  cntop1(c2, c1, c0)
  simprr(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))
  opncld(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  topontop(c0, c3)
  sseqtrd(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), c3, wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  simprl(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1))), wceq(c3, cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  toponuni(c0, c3)
  isopn2(c0, cv(hs0), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cqtop, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccld, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cima(c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))), cfv(ccld, c0))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0))))
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(c2), cdif(c3, cv(hs0)))

  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, cv(hs0))

blocks.pretty:
thm qtopcmap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c1[qTop]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ran(c2)= c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Clsd ` c1))‚Üí(c2 " s0)‚àà(Clsd ` c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqssd(c0, (c1[qTop]c2), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, c0 ‚äÜ(c1[qTop]c2), c2 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), ran(c2)= c3)
  qtopss(c2, c1, c0, c3)
  ssrdv(hs0, (c1[qTop]c2), c0, w0)
  sylbid(w0, hs0 ‚àà(c1[qTop]c2), hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1))
  syl2anc(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(c1[qTop]c2)‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), c1 ‚àà Top, (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† c3))
  elqtop2(c1, ctop, c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3, hs0)
  ex(w0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c0)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), hs0 ‚àà c0, (‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà(Clsd ` c0))
  eqeltrrd((‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0), (Clsd ` c0), (c2 "(`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0))), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)))
  eqtrd((c2 "(`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0))), (‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0), (c3 \ hs0), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)))
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (c2 "(`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)))=(c3 \ hs0), (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† c3), (c3 \ hs0)‚äÜ c3)
  difss(c3, hs0)
  foimacnv(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3, (c3 \ hs0))
  difeq1d(c3, hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)))
  rspcdva(s0, (`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)), (Clsd ` c1), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (c2 "(`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)))‚àà(Clsd ` c0), (c2 " s0)‚àà(Clsd ` c0))
  eleq1d((c2 " s0), (Clsd ` c0), (c2 "(`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0))), s0 =(`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)))
  imaeq2(s0, (`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)), c2)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Clsd ` c1),(c2 " s0)‚àà(Clsd ` c0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, (Clsd ` c1), w0, (c2 " s0)‚àà(Clsd ` c0))
  eqeltrd((`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)), (Clsd ` c1), (‚ãÉ c1 \(`' c2 " hs0)), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)))
  eqtrd((`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)), (‚ãÉ c1 \(`' c2 " hs0)), ((`' c2 " c3)\(`' c2 " hs0)), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)))
  4syl((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0))=((`' c2 " c3)\(`' c2 " hs0)), (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† c3), Fun(c2), Fun(`' `' c2))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1), (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† c3), c2[Fn]‚ãÉ c1, ran(c2)= c3)
  ffnd(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3, w0)
  df-fo(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3)
  fofun(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3)
  funcnvcnv(c2)
  imadif(`' c2, c3, hs0)
  difeq1d((`' c2 " c3), (`' c2 " hs0), ‚ãÉ c1, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)))
  syl((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (`' c2 " c3)= ‚ãÉ c1, (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí c3))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1), (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí c3))
  syl3anc(w0, (c2 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí c3), c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c1), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c2 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  sylib(w0, c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c1), c1 ‚àà Top)
  toptopon2(c1)
  cnf2(c1, ‚ãÉ c1, c0, c3, c2)
  fimacnv(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c3)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (‚ãÉ c1 \(`' c2 " hs0))‚àà(Clsd ` c1), c1 ‚àà Top, (`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1), c1 ‚àà Top)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà Top, c2 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  cntop1(c2, c1, c0)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ‚äÜ c3, (`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)
  opncld(c1, (`' c2 " hs0), ‚ãÉ c1)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî(‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà(Clsd ` c0)), c0 ‚àà Top, hs0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  syl((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), c0 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  topontop(c0, c3)
  sseqtrd(hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, c3, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 ‚äÜ c3, (`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)
  syl((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1)), c3 = ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß(`' c2 " hs0)‚àà c1), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  toponuni(c0, c3)
  isopn2(c0, hs0, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[qTop]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccld, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c2 "(`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0))), (Clsd ` c0))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, (`' c2 "(c3 \ hs0)))
  diff.cima.s(s0, `' c2, (c3 \ hs0))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccld, c0)
  diff.ccld.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: imastopn
blocks.content: The topology of an image structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm imastopn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, co(c2, cimas, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c2, c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c3))
} = {
  eqtr3d(c0, co(c1, cqtop, c2), cfv(cts, c3), w0)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cts, c3), c0, cfv(ctopn, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c3), cfv(ctopn, c3)), wss(cfv(cts, c3), cpw(cfv(cbs, c3))))
  eqsstrd(cfv(cts, c3), cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)), c1)), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cts, c3), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)), c1)), co(c1, cqtop, c2), w0)
  sylancr(w0, wceq(co(c1, cqtop, c2), crab(hs0, cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)), c1))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c1, ctopn, c4)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, universe), wfn(c2, c5), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl(w0, wfn(c2, c5), wfo(c2, c5, c6))
  fofn(c2, c5, c6)
  syl6eqel(c5, universe, cfv(cbs, c4), w0)
  fvex(cbs, c4)
  fnex(c2, c5, universe)
  qtopval(hs0, c1, universe, c2, universe, cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  syl5ss(crab(hs0, cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)), c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))), w0)
  ssrab2(hs0, cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)), c1))
  sylib(w0, wss(cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))), cpw(cfv(cbs, c3))), wss(cima(c2, cuni(c1)), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  syl5sseq(cima(c2, cuni(c1)), cfv(cbs, c3), crn(c2), w0)
  imassrn(c2, cuni(c1))
  eqtrd(crn(c2), cfv(cbs, c3), c6, w0)

  forn(c2, c5, c6)

  sspwb(cima(c2, cuni(c1)), cfv(cbs, c3))

  imastset(cfv(cts, c3), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cts, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cima(c2, cuni(c1))))
}

  ssrab2(hs0, P((c2 " ‚ãÉ c1)), ((`' c2 " hs0)‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ c1)‚àà c1)

blocks.name: imastps
blocks.content: The image of a topological space under a function is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm imastps(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ctps))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cimas, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c1, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ctps))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  eqeltrd(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0)), co(cfv(ctopn, c2), cqtop, c1), w0)
  imastopn(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c2), c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, ctps, w0)
  eleqtrd(co(cfv(ctopn, c2), cqtop, c1), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(ctopon, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(cfv(ctopn, c2), cqtop, c1), cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c3)), wfo(c1, c3, c4))
  eleqtrrd(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c3), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c2)), w0)
  sylib(w0, wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(c2, ctps))
  istps(c2, cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c2))
  fveq2d(ctopon, c3, cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  qtoptopon(cfv(ctopn, c2), c3, c1, c4)
  fveq2d(ctopon, c4, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  imasbas(c4, c0, c1, c2, c3, ctps, w0)
  istps(c0, cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà TopSp)

  imastopn((TopOpen ` c0), (TopOpen ` c2), c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, ctps, w0)
  eleqtrd(((TopOpen ` c2)[qTop]c1), (TopOn `(Base ` c0)), (TopOn ` c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((TopOpen ` c2)[qTop]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c4), (TopOpen ` c2)‚àà(TopOn ` c3), (c1 : c3 ‚Ü† c4))
  eleqtrrd((TopOpen ` c2), (TopOn ` c3), (TopOn `(Base ` c2)), w0)

blocks.name: qustps
blocks.content: A quotient structure is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qustps(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ctps))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cqus, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ctps))
} = {
  imastps(c0, cmpt(hs0, c3, cec(cv(hs0), c2)), c1, c3, cqs(c3, c2), w0)
  qusval(hs0, c0, cmpt(hs0, c3, cec(cv(hs0), c2)), c1, c2, c3, c4, ctps, w0)
  quslem(hs0, cmpt(hs0, c3, cec(cv(hs0), c2)), c3, c2, c0, c1, c4, ctps, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c3, cec(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: kqfval
blocks.content: Value of the function appearing in ~ df-kq . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s1, c3, crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0))), universe))
  id(wcel(c2, c3))
  rabexg(s0, c0, c1, wcel(c2, cv(s0)))
  fvmptg(s1, c2, c3, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0))), universe, c4, crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm kqfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ` c2)= { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 })
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà c0 | s1 ‚àà s0 })

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ` c2)= { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 }), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ` c2)= { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 }), d(s1, c1))
  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c4 ` c2)= { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 }, c2 ‚àà c3, { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  id(c2 ‚àà c3)
  rabexg(s0, c0, c1, c2 ‚àà s0)
  fvmptg(s1, c2, c3, { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 }, universe, c4, { s0 ‚àà c0 | s1 ‚àà s0 })

blocks.name: kqfeq
blocks.content: Two points in the Kolmogorov quotient are equal iff the original points are topologically indistinguishable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqfeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c4)), wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(c4, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s1, c3, crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl6bbr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c4)), wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(c4, cv(s0)))), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0))), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c4, cv(s0)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c4), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0))), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c4, cv(s0))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wceq(cfv(c5, c2), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0)))))
  kqfval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c4, cv(s0)))))
  kqfval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c4, c3, c5)
  rabbi(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(c4, cv(s0)))
}

thm kqfeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c5 ` c2)=(c5 ` c4)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî c4 ‚àà s0))))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà c0 | s1 ‚àà s0 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl6bbr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3), (c5 ` c2)=(c5 ` c4), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî c4 ‚àà s0)), { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 } = { s0 ‚àà c0 | c4 ‚àà s0 })
  eqeq12d((c5 ` c2), (c5 ` c4), { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 }, { s0 ‚àà c0 | c4 ‚àà s0 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3, (c5 ` c2)= { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà s0 })
  kqfval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3, (c5 ` c4)= { s0 ‚àà c0 | c4 ‚àà s0 })
  kqfval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c4, c3, c5)
  rabbi(s0, c0, c2 ‚àà s0, c4 ‚àà s0)
}

blocks.name: kqffn
blocks.content: The topological indistinguishability map is a function on the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqffn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c3, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), diffsc(s1, c3))
  ffnd(c2, c3, cpw(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  fmptd(s0, c2, c3, cpw(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cpw(c0)))
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cpw(c0)), wss(crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c0))
  ssrab2(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  elpw2g(c0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm kqffn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2[Fn]c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2[Fn]c3), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2[Fn]c3), d(s1, c3))
  ffnd(c2, c3, P(c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  fmptd(s0, c2, c3, P(c0), { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c3, { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 } ‚àà P(c0))
  mpbiri(c0 ‚àà c1, { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 } ‚àà P(c0), { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 } ‚äÜ c0)
  ssrab2(s1, c0, s0 ‚àà s1)
  elpw2g(c0, c1, { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: kqval
blocks.content: Value of the quotient topology function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c2))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqtr4d(cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c2), co(c0, cqtop, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, ctop, ckq, co(c0, cqtop, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), co(cv(hs0), cqtop, cmpt(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cqtop, cmpt(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), c0, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rabeq(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-kq(hs0, s0, s1)
  ovex(c0, cqtop, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  oveq2d(c0, cqtop, c2, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  syl5eq(c2, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  mpteq1d(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cqtop, cmpt(s0, cuni(c0), crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm kqval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí(KQ ` c0)=(c0[qTop]c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí(KQ ` c0)=(c0[qTop]c2)), d(s1, c1))
  eqtr4d((KQ ` c0), (c0[qTop]c2), (c0[qTop](s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (KQ ` c0)=(c0[qTop](s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })), c0 ‚àà Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, ctop, ckq, (c0[qTop](s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })), (hs0[qTop](s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà hs0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })))
  oveq12d(hs0, cqtop, (s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà hs0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }), c0, (s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  mpteq12dv(s0, ‚ãÉ hs0, { s1 ‚àà hs0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }, ‚ãÉ c0, { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  rabeq(s1, hs0, c0, s0 ‚àà s1)
  df-kq(hs0, s0, s1)
  ovex(c0, cqtop, (s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }))
  oveq2d(c0, cqtop, c2, (s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  syl5eq(c2, (s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  mpteq1d(s0, c1, { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 }, ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[qTop](s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: kqtopon
blocks.content: The Kolmogorov quotient is a topology on the quotient set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqtopon(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cfv(ctopon, crn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(ckq, c0), cfv(ctopon, crn(c2)), co(c0, cqtop, c2), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c2), cfv(ctopon, crn(c2))), wfo(c2, c1, crn(c2)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfo(c2, c1, crn(c2)), wfn(c2, c1))
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c2, c1)
  dffn4(c2, c1)
  qtoptopon(c0, c1, c2, crn(c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm kqtopon(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí(KQ ` c0)‚àà(TopOn ` ran(c2)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd((KQ ` c0), (TopOn ` ran(c2)), (c0[qTop]c2), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (c0[qTop]c2)‚àà(TopOn ` ran(c2)), (c2 : c1 ‚Ü† ran(c2)))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (c2 : c1 ‚Ü† ran(c2)), c2[Fn]c1)
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1), c2, c1)
  dffn4(c2, c1)
  qtoptopon(c0, c1, c2, ran(c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: kqid
blocks.content: The topological indistinguishability map is a continuous function into the Kolmogorov quotient. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckq, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c2, co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckq, c0)), co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c2))), wfn(c2, c1))
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c2, c1)
  qtopid(c0, c1, c2)
  oveq2d(c0, ccn, cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c2), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm kqid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](KQ ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c2, (c0[Cn](KQ ` c0)), (c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)), c2[Fn]c1)
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1), c2, c1)
  qtopid(c0, c1, c2)
  oveq2d(c0, ccn, (KQ ` c0), (c0[qTop]c2), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ist0-4
blocks.content: The topological indistinguishability map is injective iff the space is T_0. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ist0-4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wf1(c2, c1, universe)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4rd(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0), wf1(c2, c1, universe), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wral(s1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  2ralbidva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wral(s1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  imbi1d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(s1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wral(s1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))
  kqfeq(s1, s0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c2)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wf1(c2, c1, universe), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wf(c2, c1, universe))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wf(c2, c1, universe), wfn(c2, c1))
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c2, c1)
  dffn2(c2, c1)
  baib(wf(c2, c1, universe), wf1(c2, c1, universe), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  dff13(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, universe)
  ist0-2(hs0, hs1, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ist0-4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà Kol2 ‚Üî(c2 : c1 ‚Ü£ ùïå)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4rd(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà Kol2, (c2 : c1 ‚Ü£ ùïå), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c2 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚àà s1))‚Üí hs0 = hs1))))
  2ralbidva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), ((c2 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1), (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚àà s1))‚Üí hs0 = hs1))
  imbi1d((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)), (c2 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚àà s1)))
  3expb(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c1, ((c2 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs1)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚àà s1))))
  kqfeq(s1, s0, c0, (TopOn ` c1), hs0, c1, hs1, c2)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), ((c2 : c1 ‚Ü£ ùïå)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c2 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1)))), (c2 : c1 ‚Üí ùïå))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (c2 : c1 ‚Üí ùïå), c2[Fn]c1)
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1), c2, c1)
  dffn2(c2, c1)
  baib((c2 : c1 ‚Üí ùïå), (c2 : c1 ‚Ü£ ùïå), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c2 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))))
  dff13(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, universe)
  ist0-2(hs0, hs1, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

blocks.name: kqfvima
blocks.content: When the image set is open, the quotient map satisfies a partial converse to ~ fnfvima , which is normally only true for injective functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqfvima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wb(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), cima(c4, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), cima(c4, c2)))

  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wi(wcel(cfv(c4, c3), cima(c4, c2)), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, c3)))), wfn(c4, c1), wfun(c4))

  fvelima(hs0, c4, cfv(c4, c3), c2)

  syl6ci(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, c3)), wcel(c3, c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sylbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, c3)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)))))
  syl6bb(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, c3)), wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c3, c1))

  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(c2, c0))

  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  eleq2(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))
  eleq2(cv(hs1), c2, c3)
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  biimp(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.w(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cv(s1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

thm kqfvima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî(c4 ` c3)‚àà(c4 " c2)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 ` c3)‚àà(c4 " c2))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), (c3 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(c4 ` c3)‚àà(c4 " c2)), c4[Fn]c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  3expia(c4[Fn]c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 ` c3)‚àà(c4 " c2))
  fnfvima(c4, c1, c2, c3)

  3syl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), ((c4 ` c3)‚àà(c4 " c2)‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(c4 ` hs0)=(c4 ` c3))), c4[Fn]c1, Fun(c4))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c1, c4[Fn]c1)
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1), c4, c1)
  fnfun(c4, c1)
  ex(Fun(c4), (c4 ` c3)‚àà(c4 " c2), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(c4 ` hs0)=(c4 ` c3)))
  fvelima(hs0, c4, (c4 ` c3), c2)
  rexlimdva(hs0, c2, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), (c4 ` hs0)=(c4 ` c3), c3 ‚àà c2)
  syl6ci(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` hs0)=(c4 ` c3), c3 ‚àà c2, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  sylbid(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` hs0)=(c4 ` c3), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà hs1)))
  syl6bb(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` hs0)=(c4 ` c3), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà hs1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà s1)))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ((c4 ` hs0)=(c4 ` c3)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà s1))), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c1)
  simpl1(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  sselda(hs0, c2, c1, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1)

  cbvralv(s1, hs1, c0, (hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà s1), (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà hs1))

  syl(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà hs1))‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà c2)), c2 ‚àà c0)
  simpl2(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  rspcv(hs1, c2, c0, (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà hs1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà c2))

  eleq2(hs1, c2, hs0)
  eleq2(hs1, c2, c3)
  simpr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  biimp(hs0 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c3 ‚àà c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)

  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚Üî c3 ‚àà s1))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)

blocks.name: kqsat
blocks.content: Any open set is saturated with respect to the topological indistinguishability map (in the terminology of ~ qtoprest ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqsat(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqssd(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  ssrdv(hs0, cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)))), wfn(c3, c1))
  elpreima(c3, c1, cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2))
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  biimprd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2))))
  kqfvima(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3)
  syl6eqssr(c2, cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), cin(cdm(c3), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cdm(c3), c2), c2), wss(c2, cdm(c3)))
  sseqtr4d(c2, cdm(c3), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  toponss(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wceq(cdm(c3), c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cdm(c3), c1), wfn(c3, c1))
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c3, c1)
  fndm(c3, c1)
  sseqin2(c2, cdm(c3))
  dminss(c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
