thm kqsat(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(`' c3 "(c3 " c2))= c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqssd((`' c3 "(c3 " c2)), c2, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  ssrdv(hs0, (`' c3 "(c3 " c2)), c2, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  sylbid((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà(`' c3 "(c3 " c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` hs0)‚àà(c3 " c2)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚àà(`' c3 "(c3 " c2))‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` hs0)‚àà(c3 " c2))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà(`' c3 "(c3 " c2))‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` hs0)‚àà(c3 " c2))), c3[Fn]c1)
  elpreima(c3, c1, hs0, (c3 " c2))
  expimpd((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, (c3 ` hs0)‚àà(c3 " c2), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  biimprd(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), (c3 ` hs0)‚àà(c3 " c2), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  3expa(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî(c3 ` hs0)‚àà(c3 " c2)))
  kqfvima(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3)
  syl6eqssr(c2, (`' c3 "(c3 " c2)), (dom(c3)‚ãÇ c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (dom(c3)‚ãÇ c2)= c2, c2 ‚äÜ dom(c3))
  sseqtr4d(c2, dom(c3), c1, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))

  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, dom(c3)= c1)

  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1), c3, c1)
  fndm(c3, c1)

  dminss(c3, c2)

blocks.name: kqdisj
blocks.content: A version of ~ imain for the topological indistinguishability map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

thm kqdisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), emptycls)), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), emptycls)), diffsc(s1, c4))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), emptycls), wss(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)))), wceq(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2))), emptycls))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)))), wss(cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2)), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2))))
  eqsstrd(cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2)), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)), cima(c3, cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  syl5eqr(cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2)), cima(c3, cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1)), cima(c3, cdm(cres(c3, cdif(c4, c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  imadmres(c3, cdif(c4, c2))
  imaeq2d(c3, cdm(cres(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  syl5eq(cdm(cres(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1), cin(cdif(c4, c2), cdm(c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  dmres(c3, cdif(c4, c2))
  ineq2d(cdif(c4, c2), cdm(c3), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cdm(c3), c1), wfn(c3, c1))
  fndm(c3, c1)
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cima(c3, cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1)), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2))), wss(cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1), cdif(c1, c2)))
  eqsstri(cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1), cdif(c1, c2), cdif(cin(c4, c1), c2))
  indif1(c4, c2, c1)
  ax-mp(wss(cdif(cin(c4, c1), c2), cdif(c1, c2)), wss(cin(c4, c1), c1))
  inss2(c4, c1)
  ssdif(cin(c4, c1), c1, c2)
  imass2(cin(cdif(c4, c2), c1), cdif(c1, c2), c3)
  sslin(cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2)), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)), cima(c3, c2))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2))), emptycls), wral(hs0, cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2)))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wral(hs0, cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2)))), wral(hs1, cdif(c1, c2), wn(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2)))))
  ralrimiva(hs1, cdif(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wn(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2))))
  mtbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, c2))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eldifn(cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, c2))), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, c2)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  eldifi(cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  kqfvima(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs1), c3)
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wral(hs0, cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2)))), wral(hs1, cdif(c1, c2), wn(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2))))), wfn(c3, c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wfn(c3, c1))
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c3, c1)
  difss(c1, c2)
  ralima(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, cdif(c1, c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2))), wn(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2))
  disjr(hs0, cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)))
  sseq0(cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c4, c2))), cin(cima(c3, c2), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cima(c3, c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c3, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c4 \ c2)))= ‚àÖ)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)

  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c4 \ c2)))= ‚àÖ), d(s0, c4))

  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c4 \ c2)))= ‚àÖ, ((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c4 \ c2)))‚äÜ((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c1 \ c2))), ((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c1 \ c2)))= ‚àÖ)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c4 \ c2)))‚äÜ((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c1 \ c2))), (c3 "(c4 \ c2))‚äÜ(c3 "(c1 \ c2)))
  eqsstrd((c3 "(c4 \ c2)), (c3 "(c1 \ c2)), (c3 "((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1)), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  syl5eqr((c3 "(c4 \ c2)), (c3 "((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1)), (c3 " dom((c3 |`(c4 \ c2)))), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  imadmres(c3, (c4 \ c2))
  imaeq2d(c3, dom((c3 |`(c4 \ c2))), ((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  syl5eq(dom((c3 |`(c4 \ c2))), ((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1), ((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ dom(c3)), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  dmres(c3, (c4 \ c2))
  ineq2d((c4 \ c2), dom(c3), c1, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), dom(c3)= c1, c3[Fn]c1)
  fndm(c3, c1)
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (c3 "((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1))‚äÜ(c3 "(c1 \ c2)), ((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1)‚äÜ(c1 \ c2))
  eqsstri(((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1), (c1 \ c2), ((c4 ‚ãÇ c1)\ c2))
  indif1(c4, c2, c1)
  ax-mp(((c4 ‚ãÇ c1)\ c2)‚äÜ(c1 \ c2), (c4 ‚ãÇ c1)‚äÜ c1)
  inss2(c4, c1)
  ssdif((c4 ‚ãÇ c1), c1, c2)
  imass2(((c4 \ c2)‚ãÇ c1), (c1 \ c2), c3)
  sslin((c3 "(c4 \ c2)), (c3 "(c1 \ c2)), (c3 " c2))
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ((c3 " c2)‚ãÇ(c3 "(c1 \ c2)))= ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c3 "(c1 \ c2)), ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà(c3 " c2)))
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c3 "(c1 \ c2)), ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà(c3 " c2)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(c1 \ c2), ¬¨(c3 ` hs1)‚àà(c3 " c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, (c1 \ c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ¬¨(c3 ` hs1)‚àà(c3 " c2))

  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3[Fn]c1)
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1), c3, c1)
  difss(c1, c2)
  ralima(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, (c1 \ c2), ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà(c3 " c2), ¬¨(c3 ` hs1)‚àà(c3 " c2))
  notbid(hs0 =(c3 ` hs1), hs0 ‚àà(c3 " c2), (c3 ` hs1)‚àà(c3 " c2))
  eleq1(hs0, (c3 ` hs1), (c3 " c2))

  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)

blocks.name: kqcldsat
blocks.content: Any closed set is saturated with respect to the topological indistinguishability map (in the terminology of ~ qtoprest ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqcldsat(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wceq(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqssd(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))))
  ssrdv(hs0, cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)))), wfn(c3, c1))
  elpreima(c3, c1, cv(hs0), cima(c3, c2))
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sylibd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2)))))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)), wn(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2))))), wn(wa(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cima(c3, cdif(c1, c2))))))

  incom((c3 " c2), (c3 "(c1 \ c2)))

thm kqopn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cima(c3, c2), cfv(ckq, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cima(c3, c2), cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cima(c3, c2), co(c0, cqtop, c3)), wss(cima(c3, c2), crn(c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cima(c3, c2), crn(c3)))
  imassrn(c3, c2)
  eqeltrd(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  kqsat(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wb(wcel(cima(c3, c2), co(c0, cqtop, c3)), wa(wss(cima(c3, c2), crn(c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), c0))), wfo(c3, c1, crn(c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wfo(c3, c1, crn(c3)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfo(c3, c1, crn(c3)), wfn(c3, c1))
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c3, c1)
  dffn4(c3, c1)
  elqtop3(c0, c1, c3, crn(c3), cima(c3, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wceq(cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c3)))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c3 " c2)‚àà(KQ ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {

blocks.name: kqcld
blocks.content: The topological indistinguishability map is a closed map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqcld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(cima(c3, c2), cfv(ccld, cfv(ckq, c0))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cima(c3, c2), cfv(ccld, cfv(ckq, c0)), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(cima(c3, c2), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c3))), wss(cima(c3, c2), crn(c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))), wss(cima(c3, c2), crn(c3)))
  imassrn(c3, c2)
  eqeltrd(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), cfv(ccld, c0), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))))
  kqcldsat(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0)), wb(wcel(cima(c3, c2), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c3))), wa(wss(cima(c3, c2), crn(c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), cfv(ccld, c0)))))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(cima(c3, c2), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c3))), wa(wss(cima(c3, c2), crn(c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cima(c3, c2)), cfv(ccld, c0)))), wfo(c3, c1, crn(c3)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wfo(c3, c1, crn(c3)), wfn(c3, c1))
  kqffn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c3, c1)
  dffn4(c3, c1)
  qtopcld(c0, c1, c3, crn(c3), cima(c3, c2))
  fveq2d(ccld, cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c0)), wceq(cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c3)))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)

blocks.name: isr0
blocks.content: The property " ` J ` is an R_0 space". A space is R_0 if any two topologically distinguishable points are separated (there is an open set containing each one and disjoint from the other). Or in contraposition, if every open set which contains ` x ` also contains ` y ` , so there is no separation, then ` x ` and ` y ` are members of the same open sets. We have chosen not to give this definition a name, because it turns out that a space is R_0 if and only if its Kolmogorov quotient is T_1, so that is what we prove here. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: r0cld
blocks.content: The analogue of the T_1 axiom (singletons are closed) for an R_0 space. In an R_0 space the set of all points topologically indistinguishable from ` A ` is closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: kqreglem1
blocks.content: A Kolmogorov quotient of a regular space is regular. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqreglem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, creg)), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, creg)), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop), wral(hs2, cfv(ckq, c0), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wrex(hs1, cfv(ckq, c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cfv(ckq, c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)))))))

  anasss(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, creg)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(ckq, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, cfv(ckq, c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cfv(ckq, c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)))))

  sselda(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), crn(c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, creg)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(ckq, c0))))

blocks.name: kqnrmlem1
blocks.content: A Kolmogorov quotient of a normal space is normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cnrm)), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cnrm), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop), wral(hs2, cfv(ckq, c0), wral(hs0, cin(cfv(ccld, cfv(ckq, c0)), cpw(cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, cfv(ckq, c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cfv(ckq, c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)))))))

  topontop(cfv(ckq, c0), crn(c2))

blocks.name: kqtop
blocks.content: The Kolmogorov quotient is a topology on the quotient set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqtop(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cfv(ctopon, crn(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cfv(ctopon, crn(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  toptopon2(c0)
  kqtopon(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  topontop(cfv(ckq, c0), crn(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  syl6eleq(c0, ctop, cdm(ckq), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop))
  syl(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop), wcel(c0, cdm(ckq)), wcel(emptycls, cfv(ckq, c0)))
  0opn(cfv(ckq, c0))
  elfvdm(emptycls, ckq, c0)
  dmmpti(hs2, ckq, ctop, co(cv(hs2), cqtop, cmpt(hs0, cuni(cv(hs2)), crab(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  ovex(cv(hs2), cqtop, cmpt(hs0, cuni(cv(hs2)), crab(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  df-kq(hs2, hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs2.c(ctop)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: regr1
blocks.content: A regular space is R_1, which means that any two topologically distinct points can be separated by neighborhoods. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm regr1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cha))
} = {
  mpancom(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cha), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  regtop(c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  regr1lem2(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Reg ‚Üí(KQ ` c0)‚àà Haus)
} = {

  regr1lem2(hs0, hs1, c0, ‚ãÉ c0, (hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 }))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 }))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: kqreg
blocks.content: The Kolmogorov quotient of a regular space is regular. By ~ regr1 it is also Hausdorff, so we can also say that a space is regular iff the Kolmogorov quotient is regular Hausdorff (T_3). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqreg(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg))
  mpancom(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  regtop(c0)
  kqreglem1(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  mpancom(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg), wcel(c0, creg), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  sylibr(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), creg), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop))
  regtop(cfv(ckq, c0))
  kqtop(c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  kqreglem2(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
}

blocks.name: kqnrm
blocks.content: The Kolmogorov quotient of a normal space is normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqnrm(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cnrm))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cnrm))
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cnrm), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  nrmtop(c0)
  kqnrmlem1(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  mpancom(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cnrm), wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cnrm), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  sylibr(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), cnrm), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ctop))
  nrmtop(cfv(ckq, c0))
  kqtop(c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  kqnrmlem2(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
}
